meanings.definition: Designed to prevent slipping or skidding.
meanings.sent1: The antislip shoes helped me walk safely on the icy sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The antislip surface of the staircase kept me from falling.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a superhero with my antislip cape, never losing my footing.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like an antislip shield, protecting her from doubts.
meanings.sent5: The antislip grip of the handle made it easy to hold onto.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that prevents slipping.
meanings.sent1: The antislip on the floor made it safe to walk even when wet.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic applied antislip to the tools for a better grip.
meanings.sent3: The antislip gel on the banana peel prank prevented any falls.
meanings.sent4: His words were like antislip, never causing misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The antislip mat in the shower prevented accidents.
